parameters: Nature
Welcome! I am the faery-guardian of the
forest lake. I am happy because the forest
and our lake is filled with life.
Like those fish.
Nature

as well as your skills about oxygen to
put out the fire!
Nature
Thank you brave heroes! The forest is
safe again, thanks to you!
Now it is time to go back to the lab!
NET sync
Using the skills they learned and the items
they gathered, the heroes manage
to take out the fire! The air supply to the fire is
stopped and the fire died.
In our attempt to take out the fire, we dropped
the key to the laboratory! We need to find it
quickly, before we head back to the Alchemist!
We need to use our special skills
AND some items to defeat the fire!
Monster
Hahaha! You will never defeat me!
As long as I can take air, i will burn
everything!
